<<<<<<< HEAD
The moderate Christian a sermon preached in Exeter at a trienniall visitation of the Reverend Father in God, Ioseph Lord Bishop of that see. March 24. 1630. By Iohn Bury, sometime Fellow of Baliol Colledge in Oxford. Bury, John, 1580-1667.
[6], 26 p.
Printed by William Stansby, for Nathaniell Butter at Saint Anstins [sic] Gate, London : 1631.
The comma after "Christian" on the title page is turned. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
